alert.note: Alert for Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:58PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pima County through 145 PM MST... At 1258 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near San Isidro, or 8 miles northeast of Sells, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, San Isidro, Kitt Peak, Ali Chukson, Fresnal, No:ligk, Comobabi, Cababi, South Comobabi, Santa Rosa Ranch, Sil Nakya, San Luis - Sells District, Artesia, Rincon and Ali Molina. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 110 and 133. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baboquivari Mountains including Kitt Peak; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
